name: busybox-getenv-4067ec
description: env_get calls getenv in BusyBox to retrieve an environment variable and converts it to an integer using atoi. The environment variable name is specified by parameter a0, and the return value is used after being converted to an integer.
notes: Further confirmation is needed regarding the environment variable name passed when calling this function.

name: httpd-rdp-calls
